Notes: Hosts entire website and API routes
Free tier: 0.5GB storage. Pro: $19/month. Allowlist UptimeRobot IPs (see uptimerobot-ips.txt)
OAuth is free. Need to create project and credentials
Developer token approval can take days/weeks
Free tier sufficient for DM notifications

Environment Variables: NEXT_PUBLIC_CALENDLY_CLIENT_ID, CALENDLY_CLIENT_SECRET, CALENDLY_API_TOKEN, CALENDLY_SIGNING_KEY, CALENDLY_USERNAME, CALENDLY_EVENT_SLUG
Notes: API requires Professional ($15) or Teams ($20) plan
Free: 50 monitors. Pro: $7/month for 20 monitors. Allowlist 238 IPs (see uptimerobot-ips.txt)
